    		International Admissions
    	California State University, Chico offers high-quality academic programs in a safe and affordable university town community.The Fall 2023 application is open October 1st through May 1st.  Some Graduate programs have earlier deadlines. Please visit Cal State Apply for open programs.

                    Virtual Services and AdvisingTo speak with an international admissions advisor, please go to Virtual Advising and Events.  Drop-in advising hours and appointments are available.International Education & Global EngagementStudent Services Center, Room 440+1-530-898-5415iege@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/iegeDivisions of IEGEInternational AdmissionsInternational Student & Scholar ServicesStudy Abroad & ExchangeESL Support ServicesFaculty ResourcesInternational Training Programs
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
